mean_cn: adj. 可争论的，成问题的，未决定的
mean_en: not certain because people can have different ideas and opinions about the thing being discussed
sentence: The best way to spend taxes is always debatable.
sentence_trans: 将税收用在哪里一直是一个很有争议的话题。
word_etyma: de加强 ＋ bat打击 ＋ able…的 → debate加强打击=争论 ＋ able…的 → debatable可争论的
